skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: In the realm of Front-End Development, I specialize in crafting engaging and user-friendly web experiences. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I bring life to designs and ensure seamless interactions. My passion lies in creating responsive and visually stunning websites that captivate users.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: In the world of Back-End Development, I excel at building robust and scalable server-side solutions that power modern web applications. My expertise extends to creating secure APIs, managing databases, and optimizing server performance. I take pride in crafting the invisible yet essential components that make web applications function seamlessly.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: In the realm of UI/UX Design, I combine creativity with user-centric design principles to craft intuitive and visually appealing interfaces. My designs prioritize user experience, ensuring that every interaction feels natural and delightful. From wireframes to prototypes, I transform ideas into engaging digital experiences.

skills.title: Office Suite
skills.description: My proficiency in office productivity suites—Adobe Creative Suite, Google Suite, and Microsoft Office—enables me to excel in various tasks, both academic and professional. I utilize these tools for document creation, design, data analysis, and presentations. These versatile suites empower me to stay organized and efficient.

portfolio.title: CSS Generators
portfolio.description: Online tools that make it easy to create different styles for websites.

portfolio.title: Library Management
portfolio.description: A system to help libraries keep track of books and remind people when to return them.

portfolio.title: Question Forum
portfolio.description: A website where people can ask questions and have discussions on various topics.

testimonial.description: Kishor's journey from a curious learner to a skilled web developer is impressive. His adaptability and commitment are commendable.
Kishor's proficiency in coding and tools like Adobe, Google, and Microsoft makes him a versatile professional.
Kishor's problem-solving skills and passion for technology shine through. His certifications and well-rounded interests make him an asset.
